mapper.select: SELECT a.opened_lec_no openedLecNo, ar.assignment_reg_no assignmentRegNo, ar.assignment_no assignmentNo, ar.assignment_reg_title assignmentRegTitle, ar.assignment_reg_content assignmentRegContent, ar.assignment_score assignmentScore, ar.create_date createDate FROM assignment_reg ar INNER JOIN assignment a USING (assignment_no) ORDER BY ar.create_date DESC

SELECT a.opened_lec_no openedLecNo, ar.assignment_reg_no assignmentRegNo, ar.student_lec_no studentLecNo, ar.assignment_no assignmentNo, ar.assignment_reg_title assignmentRegTitle, ar.assignment_reg_content assignmentRegContent, ar.assignment_score assignmentScore, ar.create_date createDate FROM assignment_reg ar INNER JOIN assignment a USING (assignment_no) WHERE account_id = #{accountId} ORDER BY ar.create_date DESC

SELECT DISTINCT assignment_reg_no assignmentRegNo, student_lec_no studentLecNo, assignment_no assignmentNo, assignment_reg_title assignmentRegTitle, assignment_reg_content assignmentRegContent, assignment_score assignmentScore, create_date createDate FROM report_submit INNER JOIN opened_lecture WHERE opened_lec_no = #{openedLecNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO assignment_reg_img ( assignment_reg_no, content_type, origin_name, file_name, file_size ) VALUES( #{assignmentRegImg}, #{assignmentRegNo}, #{contentType}, #{originName}, #{file_name}, #{file_size} )
mapper.select: SELECT ar.assignment_reg_no assignmentRegNo, ar.student_lec_no studentLecNo, ar.assignment_no assignmentNo, ar.assignment_reg_title assignmentRegTitle, ar.assignment_reg_content assignmentRegContent, ar.assignment_score assignmentScore, ar.create_date createDate, ari.file_name fileName, ari.content_type contentType FROM assignment_reg ar INNER JOIN assignment_reg_img ari USING (assignment_reg_no) WHERE assignment_reg_no = #{assignmentRegNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE assignment_reg SET assignment_reg_title = #{assignmentRegTitle}, assignment_reg_content = #{assignmentRegContent}, update_date= now() WHERE assignment_reg_no = #{assignmentRegNo}
UPDATE assignment_reg SET assignment_score = #{assignmentScore}, update_date = now() WHERE assignment_reg_no = #{assignmentRegNo}
